description: Erection of hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer to facilitate a loft conversion, external wall insulation, window alterations and 3 No. roof lights to pitched roof.
decision_conditions: In scaling off the submitted drawings, the proposals exceed the 50 cubic metres content of the original roof space parameter  for a semi detached dwelling. Therefore, the proposal would be contrary to  Condition B.2 (d) (ii (the cubic content of the resulting roof space would exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more that - (i) 40 cubic metres in case of a terrace house or (ii) 50 cubic metres in any other cases) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order (as amended)

Insufficient and imprecise information has been submitted to demonstrate that, on the balance of probability, the proposed external insulation would not materially affect the external appearance of the dwellinghouse. It has therefore not been demonstrated that the proposed works would comprise works as described under Section 55 (2) (a) (ii) of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) ( as amended) and as such the proposed external insulation is considered to comprise development which would require planning permission .
